text: @Pooley4891Poole @Feargal_Sharkey @wakou2 @EnvAgency @KenGoodwinITV @thameswater @Britnatureguide @ChrisGPackham @CarlBovisNature @domdyer70 @MeganMcCubbin @ExtinctionR @Lucy_Lapwing @GreeneIndy @HantsIWWildlife @WildlifeTrusts I would say as clean as if from a reasonable clean river - after that we are on the slippery slope. Would help if we didn't put into cleaning products, chemicals labelled 'harmful to aquatic life with long-lasting effects'

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Autumnwatch
entity.description: BBC's popular wildlife programme records the changes in nature across four days in autumn, using a network of cameras to track the action in real time, including never-filmed-before behaviour, as animals prepare for their toughest time of the year. Presenters anchor `Autumnwatch' from a different base each year, and camera teams are spread throughout the UK, showcasing the beauty of iconic wild places and revealing new and surprising wildlife stories as they happen.

We are working to create a suite of wetland #habitats at the former Rugeley Power Station. This will help increase capacity to hold water in high flood events reducing damage downstream. The new habitats will be beneficial to a range of wetland species. #LetNatureHelp @EnvAgency https://t.co/z9IWi1tAB8

The winner of the #TeamAchievementAward is @BostonBarrierEA for their teamwork on a primary rising sector barrier gate, flood walls and a control building.

Well done @EnvAgencyMids @BAMNuttall & @MottMacDonald! 

#EMMAs2020 https://t.co/araEJ3ymMH

text:
@Only1MaxyD @SalfordCouncil @EnvAgency @KeepBritainTidy Hi
This area, North Bay at the rear of The Alchemist, belongs to Peel Ports so you would need to report this to them. We have just cleared 20 tonnes of debris from the sections of water that belong to us.
Thanks
Louise
